version_description:
- Onward & upward! Scale the NEW island Crystal Falls.
- Spring's hit the islands, but we've already caught the bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.
- We’ve zapped some bugs!

- Precious! The Amethyst Caverns are open for tourists. Visit this NEW island now!
- Earn more every day. Check out the NEW Daily Quests for rewards!

- Introducing Clubs! Unlock Perks, chat with friends, and work towards bonus rewards.
- Check out the NEW Daily Quests for rewards! Earn more every day!
- Visit this NEW island now! The Amethyst Caverns are open for tourists.

- Travel made easy – check out the NEW World Selector to get between Tiki Skies & Tiki Islands.
- Enjoy the new menu! See your progress, profile, and more on an easier-to-navigate display.
- The Tiki Torches are keeping bugs away! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

- Travel made easy – check out the NEW World Selector to get between Tiki Skies & Tiki Islands.
- Enjoy the new menu! See your progress, profile, and more on an easier-to-navigate display.
- The Tiki Torches are keeping bugs away! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

- New Island - Shipwreck Shores! See what lies beyond in Shipwreck Shores.
- Introducing Portraits Collections! Complete goals to unlock portraits. Customize your profile. Master goals & unlock golden portraits!
- Treat your Club Members! Pick up a new Gift Box in the Gift Shop and everyone in your Club will earn rewards.

Check out the new Club House!
- See how your Club compares!
- Check your Club Rank in the Rankings window.
- Keep track of each Member’s progress in the My Club window.

- NEW Island: Glowing Grotto! Uncover secrets hidden deep within the caves. Keep an eye out for Cave Pigs and meet Guddha, their mystical guru.
- NEW Crystal Hazard: Clear the Crystal Card to reveal a prize card in Glowing Grotto!
- Improved Inbox: Get ALL the latest news in one place.
- We zapped some bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

- Jump right in with Quick Launch! Now starting the game takes you directly to your current level.
- Improved handling of network issues for a smoother play experience.

* Jump right in with Quick Launch! Now starting the game takes you directly to your current level.
* Improved handling of network issues for a smoother play experience
* Bug Fixes to improve loading and startup

- GEMS!! Clubs can earn Gems for members by ranking in Club Contests!
- Amazing prizes await! Spend Gems in the new Gem Shop for bigger prizes than ever!
- NEW Island: Journey to the Mermaid Manor and play all new levels!
We zapped some bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

- New Island: Come by and dive into Rainbow Reefs and encounter the Giant Rainbow Salamander.
- Updated Scrolling for the Rankings page of the Clubhouse: Ever wondered which clubs were in the top 500? Now you can! We updated the scrolling in the Rankings page to allow players to scroll farther down the lists now.
- We zapped some bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

· Club Quests:  Quests have been a popular feature in Tripeaks for individuals and now we’ll be adding Club Quests that require a minimum number of members to complete. These new Quest are in addition to a player’s individual Daily Quest and will be found in the Quest screen. Rally your teammates and get the Quest done before time expires!
· Leaderboard Update:  The weekly red star leaderboard is getting a pretty significant update to make the competition more fun for everyone and to give out better rewards.
· Club Co-Leaders:  Leaders (formerly known as Organizers) will now have the ability to promote any number of Club Members to be Co-Leaders of the club. Leaders and Co-Leaders will now be able to work together to manage the Club roster.
· Expert Levels:  Expert Levels can now be found in the World Selector. If you are on an Island, tap Map and then tap World to find the new location. 
· Club Volcano: The Volcano in Clubs will be adjusted such that Clubs struggling to get the first few Perks will experience fewer eruptions during a Perk Event.
· We zapped some bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.
- We zapped some bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

What’s New:
- Faster Retry: We have made it quicker for players to retry and play a game.
- Multi-Device Fix: In the interest of fairness for all our players, we have fixed an issue where players were able to get duplicated rewards by collecting from more than 1 device. This means players will not be able to play on multiple devices using the same account at the same time.
- We’ve zapped some bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

This update focuses on some minor additions and tweaks, but mainly a lot of bug fixing.
- New Island: Welcome to Whale Pod Paradise! Play 140 new levels!
- Perk Event End Update: Extended Perk events by 55 minutes so there is now only 5 minutes of downtime between events.

What’s New:
- Faster Retry: We have made it quicker for players to retry and play a game.
- Multi-Device Fix: In the interest of fairness for all our players, we have fixed an issue where players were able to get duplicated rewards by collecting from more than 1 device. This means players will not be able to play on multiple devices using the same account at the same time.
- We’ve zapped some bugs! Enjoy fewer gameplay interruptions.

- Perk Reorder: Now Leaders and Co-Leaders will be able to set their Club's perk order based on their desired strategy.
- Daily Bonus Reward: The new Daily Bonus Reward allows to come back to Solitaire TriPeaks each day and collect a reward. Keep coming back every day consecutively to receive better and bigger rewards.
- More bug fixes. We are continually trying to make Solitaire TriPeaks the best that it can be, so if you spot a glitch in the game that really annoys you - Let us know.

- COMING SOON - Club Quests. Club Quests are in addition to a player’s individual Daily Quest and will be found in the Quest screen. Rally your teammates and get the Quest done before time expires!
- All Quests will now have COLLECT and DISMISS options. Tap COLLECT to collect your Quest Reward and tap DISMISS to dismiss an expired Quest.

- COMING SOON - Club Quests. Club Quests are in addition to a player’s individual Daily Quest and will be found in the Quest screen. Rally your teammates and get the Quest done before time expires!
- All Quests will now have COLLECT and DISMISS options. Tap COLLECT to collect your Quest Reward and tap DISMISS to dismiss an expired Quest.

COMING SOON: Club Notes! Club Leaders, you’ll soon be able to share important news with your Club by posting on your Club Notes Board! Open Club Chat or go to the new Club Notes Island to check it out.
Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire Tri Peaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire Tri Peaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

Club Tournaments: Now casual Clubs can enjoy better competition, compete for better rewards, experience the fun of focused teamwork, and the joy moving up the ranks!
Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire Tri Peaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

Club Tournaments: Now casual Clubs can enjoy better competition, compete for better rewards, experience the fun of focused teamwork, and the joy moving up the ranks!
Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire Tri Peaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

Better Load Times! Many players will enjoy getting into the game a bit quicker.
Coming Soon: “Club Champs!” The top three players in each Club will compete to become Club Champ!
And of course - a few more bug fixes! A few small and hardly noticeable and, a couple on the stinky side, but we always strive to give those ugly “bugs” makeovers and turn them into “productive critters.”

• Introducing Jungle Jamboree in Tiki Paradise! New levels - including one in which you’ll meet Chief Roko and his sweet and/or sour Butterfly Vault.
• More bug fixes! Please note, we do not kill any bugs, we simply nurture them out of their bug-like state. If you happen to spot a glitch, please drop us a line and we’ll look into it.
Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire TriPeaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.
The islands are calling… with 150 NEW LEVELS! Check back soon to explore Paradise Point and test your skills!
Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire TriPeaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

What’s New:
COMING SOON: Travel to Tiki Paradise and experience our latest feature - Double Stack! Draw two cards and use them both to clear the playfield.
Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire TriPeaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

• New HOLIDAY Events are coming to the Islands this season you won’t want to miss! Be on the lookout!
• Help Tiki find his lost cards! More Scavenger Hunts!
• Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire TriPeaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

• New HOLIDAY Events are coming to the Islands this season you won’t want to miss! Be on the lookout!
• Help Tiki find his lost cards! More Scavenger Hunts!
• Bug fixes: We’re always trying to make Solitaire TriPeaks the best it can be, so if you spot a glitch that we need to fix, drop us a line and we’ll look into it.

• A special Valentine’s Day Event is coming to steal your heart!
• Karma Karma Karma Comedian! He’s got the microphone, and testing his skills in an upcoming Karma the Comedian event… where you have the chance to win the Punchline Chest.
• A new Rescue Mission! Save Mini-Tikis and match your way to sweet rewards!
• Bug fixes: we don’t like accidentally creating bugs, but we sure love exterminating them! If you find one, let us know so we can look into it!

• A special Valentine’s Day Event is coming to steal your heart!
• Karma Karma Karma Comedian! He’s got the microphone, and testing his skills in an upcoming Karma the Comedian event… where you have the chance to win the Punchline Chest.
• A new Rescue Mission! Save Mini-Tikis and match your way to sweet rewards!
• Bug fixes: we don’t like accidentally creating bugs, but we sure love exterminating them! If you find one, let us know so we can look into it!

• Look out for brand new *daily* events!
• Aye, with St. Paddy’s around the corner, keep yer eyes out for the “Lofty Leprechaun” event!
• And with Easter soon following - look for the Easter “Eggs”travaganza event as well!
• YEEHAW! Put on your cowboy hat! You’ll be savin’ more Mini-Tikis! in our next Seasonal Event - with a western twist!
• Aaaaah…paradise calls, as will a brand new island!
• Bug fixes: we make ‘em, you find ‘em, we smash ‘em! If you find one, let us know so we can look into it!

• Look for a new Rescue Mission with a sakura twist!
• Spring is in the air - join us for an upcoming “Indoor Garden Party” event!
• The Friend Center will be putting the focus on “friend” with a major upcoming addition!
• Oooh… we’re introducing a new, fun event on the horizon!
• Bug fixes: we carefully extract them from the game and put them back into the wild. If you find one, let us know so we can look into it.

• YEE HAW - Cowboy Rescue Mission is ridin’ into town!
• Introducing the ALL NEW EVENT CENTER, featuring Bailey the Parrot!
• Chief Roko and Pele tempt you with their Trials.
• STOP THIEF! Someone stole Poi’s Cookies. Help solve the Great Cookie Caper!
• Bug fixes: we’ve removed the ones we’ve found and placed them back in nature. If you see any others, let us know,

• YEE HAW - Cowboy Rescue Mission is ridin’ into town!
• Introducing the ALL NEW EVENT CENTER, featuring Bailey the Parrot!
• Chief Roko and Pele tempt you with their Trials.
• STOP THIEF! Someone stole Poi’s Cookies. Help solve the Great Cookie Caper!
• Bug fixes: we’ve removed the ones we’ve found and placed them back in nature. If you see any others, let us know,

• YEE HAW - Cowboy Rescue Mission is ridin’ into town!
• Introducing the ALL NEW EVENT CENTER, featuring Bailey the Parrot!
• Chief Roko and Pele tempt you with their Trials.
• STOP THIEF! Someone stole Poi’s Cookies. Help solve the Great Cookie Caper!
• Bug fixes: we’ve removed the ones we’ve found and placed them back in nature. If you see any others, let us know,

• Friend Center Relay Update - win streaks against friends for big rewards!
• Samurai Mini-Tikis will need YOUR help in the next Rescue Mission!
• Chief Roko: The Sequel. Better than the original!
• Collect ‘em all in the Captain Karma’s Collectibles event!
• And of course, in keeping with our new motto: “Hugs, not Bugs”, we’ve replaced some of those darn critters with invisible hugs. If you see any bugs, let us know!

- Introducing Captain Karma’s Collectibles Event!
- Be on the lookout for LOST KEYS - our newest Event!
- Samurai Mini-Tikis will need YOUR help in the next Rescue Mission!
- Bug fixes: Issue in Tiki Skies not awarding Wilds fixed, plus others! If you see anymore, please let us know!

• Check out “Pele’s Fire Trials!” - an event unlike any other!
• The Mini-Tikis on mechanical bulls? It’s another Rescue Mission!
• Get ready for the TriPeaks Luau Event.
• Bug fixes: we fix ‘em when we see ‘em! If you see any, please let us know.

• Chief Roko will be depending on you to help him with his trials!
• The Mini-Tikis attempt the mechanical bulls again in another Rescue Mission!
• Prepare thyself for the upcoming Medieval Faire!
• Bug fixes: they creep in, we scrape ‘em out! Let us know if you see any!

Oh Honey - you’ll be busy like a bee with the next Rescue Mission!
What ho? Why, you shan’t miss the Medieval Faire.
Find the Lost Emeralds in the upcoming Scavenger Hunt!
Bugs be gone! Many of them you may or may not have noticed, are no longer. Those that remain? If you find ‘em let us know!

• Fall into the Lost Leaves Scavenger Hunt!
• Flowers are always in season for the Lei of the Orchid Luau!
• Bone up for Bailey’s Bash - 6 Trials in 48 Hours!
• Haunted Mini Tikis? You’ll see ‘em in the upcoming Seasonal event!
• Bug fixes: We exorcise the bugs when we find ‘em! If you see any, let us know!

• Tiki Treat? The Mini-Tikis run from ghosts in the newest Rescue Mission, which is haunted with extra BONUSES!
• You’ll fall for our brand new Fall themed card backs.
• Harvest is here with the Cornucopia Delight - our newest chained event! Complete to win a Full Harvest Diamond Chest!
• And just in time for Halloween, you will be visited by Ghostly Pele in the newest event!
• Bug fixes: We reserve the right to exorcise any and all bugs when we find them. If you find any, let us know!

• They’re baaack! It’s another Samurai Mini-Tiki Rescue!
• Party up with Poi’s Pumpkin Pie Quest!
• Catch ‘em if you can in the Gingerbread Getaway Scavenger Hunt!
• Get stuffed with Thanksgiving Deals
• Stay connected for Cyber Monday Madness
• Bugs be gone! If you see any, let us know!

• Get merry with Marina’s Missing Mistletoe!
• Feel the spirit with the Ornament Endeavor
• Get toasty with the Frosty Fiesta Event!
• Gorgeous Winter Card Backs
• BLAST into the next year with the Rocketship 2021 Event!
• The Mini-Tikis need your help in the Snowball Rescue!
• Holiday Sales! ‘Tis the season for savings! Stay tuned!
• What’s that comin’ down the chimney? Bug fixes! If you see any others, let us know!

• Par-TAY with the penguins in the 48-hour Penguin Beach Bash!
• Don’t flake out on the Splendid Snowflakes Scavenger Hunt!
• Create an amazing ice castle in the Ice Castle Escapade!
• Go coco for the Collectible Cocoa Mugs Scavenger Hunt!
• Oh HONEY - Mini Tikis have discovered a den of fun in the Honey Bear Rescue!
• The bugs may be cold this time of year, but we gently move them to the wilds anyhow. If you find any, let us know!

• Collect chocolate, teddy bears and flowers while our favorite game dog prepares for the Poi’ Fect Party!
• Follow your heart in the latest Scavenger Hunt: Sweetheart Surprise!
• Puppies. Love. Food. It’s the Puppy Love Picnic! Complete 5 events to reveal what Poi is up to!
• Valentine’s Day Cardbacks will warm your heart through Valentine’s Day!
• We love Valentine’s Day, but we don’t love bugs! If you find any, please let us know!

• Collect chocolate, teddy bears and flowers while our favorite game dog prepares for the Poi’ Fect Party!
• Follow your heart in the latest Scavenger Hunt: Sweetheart Surprise!
• Puppies. Love. Food. It’s the Puppy Love Picnic! Complete 5 events to reveal what Poi is up to!
• Valentine’s Day Cardbacks will warm your heart through Valentine’s Day!
• We love Valentine’s Day, but we don’t love bugs! If you find any, please let us know!

• Be on the lookout for the Butterfly Bonanza! Beautiful Butterflies bring bounty!
• Recover the Clovers! Find the missing Clovers! Choose your Chase and collect your prize!
• The Lofty Leprechaun! 9 Events - 2 Chests to win!
• Better than a pot o’ gold - St. Patricks card backs!
• Save the Mini-Tikis in the next Cowboy Rescue Mission!
• As always - fun, new-themed bundles for sale!
• And bugs. We encouraged them to be free. Let us know if you see any!

• Help the Buccaneer Bunnies create the best basket in the Basket Bonanza!
• Find your pot o’ prizes catching rainbows in the Roaming Rainbow Scavenger Hunt!
• The Mini-Tikis need your help in the Karatiki Rescue Mission!
• As always - fun, new-themed bundles for sale!
• We’ve eliminated many naughty bugs! If you find any others, let us know!

• The Hunt is ON in the Easter EggStravaganza event! Complete all events to win TWO Chests!
• Save Mini-Tikis in another Rescue Mission!
• Spring is here, but where are the tulips? Help find them in the Timid Tulips Scavenger Hunt!
• Join us for a cuppa in Pele's Afternoon Tea Party - and win the Magma Sequel Chest!
• As always - fun new themed bundles for sale!
• We’ve carefully extracted naughty bugs and sent them to rehabilitation school. If you see any playing hooky, please let us know!

• Spring Break is finally here! Complete 5 events to win the Dream Chest, and all 9 events for the Spring Dreams Chest! 
• Everything’s blooming, but where are the tulips! Help find them in the Timid Tulips Scavenger Hunt! 
• Join us for a cuppa in Pele's Afternoon Tea Party - and win the Magma Sequel Chest! 
• As always - fun new themed bundles for sale! 
• We’ve been drowning bugs like they’re Mini-Tikis in a Rescue Mission! Let us know if you see any!

• Find those brilliant stones in the Runaway Rubies Scavenger Hunt!
• Tiki's Hittin' The Road. Tiki’s all packed up and ready to go!
• Join us for our Garden Party! Complete all 5 events to win the Garden Chest!
• Help the Mini-Tikis keep the bees out of the hives in the Honey Bear Rescue - and earn CLUB POINTS!
• As always - fun new themed bundles for sale!
• Customary bug extermination - if you see any new ones, let us know!

• Find fabulous Fireworks in the Forgotten Fireworks Scavenger Hunt!
• Tiki’s getting in shape lifting weights, running sprints and getting ready for the BIG GAMES! Help him and earn the Gold Medal Sequel Chest!
• Enjoy the Lei of Orchid Luau and earn the White and Purple Orchid Chests!
• The Mini-Tikis need your help again! Win Wilds, Volcanos, Boosters and MORE! - including CLUB POINTS!
• More fun new themed bundles for sale!
• Many bugs dead. If you see any new ones, let us know!

• It's a Dino Hunt! Uncover fossils to earn the Half-Dino and Full-Dino Chests!
• "The Mighty-Minis" compete in the Coconut Cavern Karate Chop Championship! Help them and win MASSIVE rewards!
• Pele’s Double Points Party! Win NEW LEVELS get DOUBLE CLUB POINTS!
• Misplaced Pearls Scavenger Hunt! Choose one to enter and win your favorite prize!
• Tiki’s Backyard Barbecue! - Tiki’s got a brand-new grill so YOU can earn the Charbroiled Chest!
• Zapped bugs. If you see any new ones, let us know

• Captain Karma’s Collectibles - collect ‘em all and win the Karma Chest!
• Oh no! The Mini-Tikis need your help in an exciting Rescue Mission!
• Elusive Acorns Scavenger Hunt - Corral those Acorns back up!
• As always - new and fun bundles for sale!
• We’ve escorted some naughty bugs out of the game, and locked the doors so they can't come back. If you see any new ones, let us know!

• Help Tiki complete his Coat of Armor in the Medieval Essentials Event!
• Mini-Tikis needs supplies for school! Join him for the Back to School Bustle!
• Be on the lookout for new fun-themed bundles for sale!
• We've flunked and expelled some naughty bugs from the game. If you see any new ones, tattle on them by letting us know!

• Oh no! Mini-Tikis need your help in the Honeybear Rescue!
• Season 3 of Skylands begins! Set a personal record!
• Fear not the Squad of Scarecrows, for they bring Chests!
• Help Poi collect his Halloween Costumes!
• Tiki needs you to help him find his candy in the Lost Candy Corn event!
• Halloween-themed bundles for sale!
• Zapped and zombie-proofed! We’ve killed bugs! If you see any others, let us know!

• Prepare thyself… There's a Halloween Rescue Mission in your future!
• Skylands Season 4 starts!
• Help the Mini-Tikis find the perfect Thanksgiving Dinner in the Lost Turkeys Event!
• Grab a delicious Pumpkin Pie for the holidays in the Lost Pumpkin Pie Event!
